head.title: Jennifer Powers to Marry F. S. Buddemeyer 4th

hedline.hl1: Jennifer Powers to Marry F. S. Buddemeyer 4th

block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Thomas D. Burke of New Rochelle, N.Y., have announced the engagement of Mrs. Burke's daughter, Jennifer Catherine Powers, to Frederick Scott Buddemeyer 4th, the son of Mrs. Frederick Buddemeyer 3d of New York and the late Mr. Buddemeyer. A June wedding is planned.

Mr. and Mrs. Thomas D. Burke of New Rochelle, N.Y., have announced the engagement of Mrs. Burke's daughter, Jennifer Catherine Powers, to Frederick Scott Buddemeyer 4th, the son of Mrs. Frederick Buddemeyer 3d of New York and the late Mr. Buddemeyer. A June wedding is planned.

Miss Powers, 26 years old, graduated magna cum laude from Iona College and is a graduate student in social work at Columbia University. Her father was the late Peter W. Powers. Mr. Buddemeyer, 27, is a managing director of Northgate Communications, a cable television company in Los Angeles. He graduated from the University of California at San Diego and received an M.B.A. from Dartmouth College.
